channel.title: Facebook app. page
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Facebook app. page"

item.title: Re: Facebook app. page
item.content:encoded: Who wants to be my facebook friend? Send me a message, we'll coordinate! :D

item.title: Facebook app. page
item.content:encoded:
We should make a page for Facebook app, explaining how the app works. I can't (or at least don't think I can) make pages myself, so I'm requesting it here.

As of right now, having 3 (I think) friends who also have the app gives you 10 stamina a day.
Having 8 friends gives you 20.
Having 20 friends gives you 40.
Something (<32) gives you 60 (just blew the requirement out of the water- I got somewhere around 20 friend requests overnight, and now have 31 :P)
It appears to have switched. You now need 70 friends for 60 stamina, and I can't find out the rest of the checkpoints.

If I get any more info, I'll post it here, or in the page if it gets made.
